summary: This document is an email correspondence confirming a meeting between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein at Epstein's residence. The email specifies the time and location of the meeting.

persons.name: Paul Morris

persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual hosting the meeting at his home.

events.title: Meeting Confirmation
events.description: Confirmation of a meeting between Paul Morris and Jeffrey Epstein at Epstein's residence.

keyFacts: The email confirms a meeting scheduled for January 16, 2013, at 4:30 PM.
The meeting is to take place at Jeffrey Epstein's home.
The location is specified as 9 East 71st Street, between 5th and Madison in New York.
